args:
Void dragons answering the control of Phares
attack the prince and his friends, but a wounded
Leonidas repels their assault. When Phares
takes heel, the party pursues him to a body
of water known as Lake Reeve.
Day 13, Month of the Lovely Dragon:\nIt appears like this will be my final entry.
I took a supposed wyrmscale cure I\ndiscovered in an ancient text,\nbut feel no effect.

My disease continues to plague me.
I suffer from a kind of sensory paralysis.
I lack all strength. My pulse slows.
My hands are ice. My mind is in disarray.
Why am I alone burdened with this curse?\nFie, but I can stand it no longer.
I don't want to die...\nI don't want to die!
Day 14, Month of the Lovely Dragon:\nI am alive. New strength courses\nthrough my body.
It should be a moment for celebration.\nBut it is of no consequence to me now...
I remember this journal entry well.\nIt was the day I survived.
Now the wyrmscale that once ate away\nat my body has become my very limbs.
The shackles which bound me have gone.\nThus, I have but to push forward on the\npath to the ultimate truth.
And so do I begin my inquiry...
Void dragon of wind! Void dragon of fire!\nLet loose your onslaught!
Prince Phares is controlling void dragons!
I knew the guy was a tough nut to crack,\nbut I thought he was WITH Leonidas!\nInstead, he's gonna attack us all!
Phares, this is useless! You must stop!
No, man! Don't run after him all alone!
I understand why you'd attack me, Phares,\nbut Leonidas is also here!
Otherwise, you will die this day and\nbecome an offering to my void dragons.
Ho, Leonidas. Will you face me as well?\nIt is a fine day if so!
Hmm. What a waste. I'll not be able to\nglean any meaningful conclusions from\nthis sad display.
Black mana...is good for naught...\nbut ostentatious show!
How on earth can he marshal up this\nkind of power in such a wounded state?
Leonidas, stop! If you shapeshift now,\nyou're going to...
Ngh... I am a conqueror, my brother...\nAND A CONQUEROR DOES NOT YIELD!
Holy snot... He took 'em both out!
Never have I seen pride birth such\nstrength... He truly is a man of\nunyielding ambition.
Hmm. Interesting. Well, your actions at\nleast serve as proof that there is no issue\nwith the development of the void dragons.
Now, I shall proceed to the next step.\nFarewell, one and all.
Phares, stop! Why are you doing this?!
No. Never mind. There are more important\nthings we need to take care of now.\n...Cleo, can you heal my brother?
I shall do all that I can.
You're...the only one now...\nYou must...stop him...
Leave him to me, Your Highness.
All right, Alex. And thank you.
Everyone! We're headed back to the\nHalidom to resupply and rest up.\nThen we make for Lake Reeve.
Pah. My brother's soft-hearted\nnature knows no bounds.
Perhaps so. And yet, that is the reason\nwe all follow him as we do.
Can you move, Leonidas? If you're in\npain, I can... Wait, why am I asking?\nYou would never admit such regardless.
To rely on you of all people for aid is proof\nof how low I have fallen.
It is doubly strange for me, considering\nI once turned my blade on you.

But seeing you stand against the dragons
reminded me anew that you are a man
who does not yield in the face of threats.
It filled me with a familiar kind of...hope.
Come on, let's go. Slowly, now.
